channel.title: Labor Markets on Nikhil George
channel.description: Recent content in Labor Markets on Nikhil George

item.title: Technology Change and Worker Transitions: Understanding Mobility through Occupational Skill Space
item.description: This paper introduces a novel approach to understanding worker mobility through occupation-specific skill embeddings, analyzing how technological change affects worker transitions.

item.title: How Informative are Job Posting Skill Measures? Evidence from Selection Decisions
item.description: This paper provides the first empirical validation of job posting informativeness by predicting selection for internal jobs using skill distance measures.
